name: Pirate Hero Fury Shooting on The Road Free Games
name_original: Pirate Hero Fury Shooting on The Road Free Games
description:
Shooting game in Pirates style! Let's free to unlock our companions! To unlock all unique GUN!!!! In Free Version Game Start with 200 Coins & 10 Diamonds

Let Make Pirates Hero TEAM to destroy all of you enemy and collect all items in your race!

FEATURES
- Make strategy unique team from 9 heroes for rival in the exciting journal.
- EXTRA GUN makes for you like fire, cannon, bomb, and ice gun.
- 80+ unique monsters, traps and turrets.
- 35 BRUTAL BOSS in unique.
- 35 Stage levels in story mode.
- Non-stop fun with endless mode to battle the entire enemy.
- Rescue the hostage to get diamond box and get free many prizes.
- Get all characters and gun for your collection.
